mapper.insert: insert into product( category_no, material_no, color_no, sex_no, brand_no, size_no, m_id, p_supply, p_name, p_content, p_price, p_sale, p_image_m, p_image_s, p_pdate, p_country, p_entry ) values( #{category_no}, #{material_no}, #{color_no}, #{sex_no}, #{brand_no}, #{size_no}, 'admin@f4mall.com', #{p_supply}, #{p_name}, #{p_content}, #{p_price}, #{p_sale}, #{p_image_m}, #{p_image_s}, #{p_pdate}, #{p_country}, now() )
mapper.delete: delete from product where p_no = #{ p_no }
mapper.select: select * from product where p_no = #{ p_no }
